metadata.title: Umgee Textured Knit Tunic with Fringe Accents
features: Short Sleeve Slub Knit Tunic with Fringe
High Low Tunic 30" in the Front 32" in the Back Side Slit
Hand Wash Cold then Hang to Dry
description: We at SalonBoutik hand pick all of our styles and pick only top quality so our customers can shop with confidence.Umgee is one of the best quality young contemporary brands in the USA offering the most up-to date style trends.
